inclusion.criterion: Dr. Jamal Mourad or Dr. Nichole Mahnert will be performing hysterectomy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: VR intervention includes the Samsung VR Innovator edition goggle set, fitted with Samsung Galaxy Note 4 mobile phone
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: Adverse events/reactions will be reported to the UA IRB
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a healthy woman with no underlying disease, undergoing laparoscopic hysterectomy for benign indications. The VR intervention does not trigger any exclusion criteria.
